author: Simon Rice
title: Manchester United star Daley Blind posts touching message after father is sacked as Holland manager
text:
Father and son Danny and Daley on international duty (Getty) Daley Blind posted a touching message on Instagram after his father was sacked as Netherlands manager last night.
Danny Blind was given the boot following a shock 2-0 defeat to Bulgaria on Saturday that leaves the Netherlands struggling to qualify for the 2018 World Cup in Russia. The Dutch find themselves fourth in their qualifying group at the halfway stage.
Revealed: The real reason Jamie Vardy looked like he was wearing make-up Blind was handed the job in 2015 with the side struggling to qualify for Euro 2016. He was unable to turn things around sufficiently and they failed to make it to the tournament. Things haven’t improved since and the Dutch FA felt the need to make a change. They have placed Fred Grim in charge as interim coach for Tuesday’s friendly with Italy.
Manchester United player Daley said working with his father on the international stage was ‘a dream come true’ and that he was ‘proud’ despite things not working out.
Samen gewerkt op het allerhoogste niveau, een droom voor ons beide als vader en zoon. Het was niet makkelijk en het heeft niet altijd mee gezeten maar ik ben trots op hoe je je altijd verantwoordelijk heb gehouden en nooit heb opgegeven! – Working together as father and son at top level was a dream that came true. You never walked away from your responsibilities and you never gave up. I'm proud of you. 
A post shared by Daley Blind (@blinddaley) on Mar 26, 2017 at 2:09pm PDT
